sequence:
Loaded with Lead and Love

<size=45>Chapter 1 - The Cleaning Crew</size>

scripts.say: Though I was supposed to be taking the day off, I didn't particularly have anything I wanted to do, so I soon found myself wandering aimlessly around the port.
Hey, Suffolk! Let's have a race to see who can get across the corridor faster!
Eh? I think I'll pass~ Besides, I can't keep up with you anyway, so just let me space out over here~
I take my eyes off you two for a second, and....
I could hear the voices of Kent and Suffolk coming from the Royal Navy dormitory, but who was this third voice?
Kent, though I commend your dedication towards staying active, you may find that you cannot clean the floor by running all over it.
Suffolk, you haven't moved from that cranny since before I left. It must either be very cozy, or very, very, dirty.
Eh? Y-y-you've got it wrong! I've been cleaning properly!
Sure enough, it was Sheffield, who recently was assigned to secretary duties.
Hm... Master? Do you require something?
So, you're just taking a stroll...?
Well then, if you don't mind, please take a few steps back. You're soiling the freshly-mopped floor.
Ah... as professionally merciless as ever...
Also, since you're just taking a stroll, I would like to recommend you a more pleasant place to stroll to. Anywhere but here, actually, since we are currently busy cleaning.
If you return in, say, about an hour, there may be the possibility of tea and scones. Just maybe.
As soon as she finished talking, Sheffield promptly returned to her cleaning. So this is the absolute professionalism that even has Belfast's seal of approval...
Well, since I really did have nothing better to do, I might as well come back later.
